name: Comatose
firstNightReminder: If the Comatose died today or tonight, do not go into morning; instead, run another night immediately. Any 'tomorrow morning' abilities activated on the first night will carry over into the next morning.
otherNightReminder: If the Comatose died today or tonight, do not go into morning; instead, run another night immediately. Any 'tomorrow morning' abilities activated on the first night will carry over into the next morning.
ability: If the Demon kills you or votes for your execution, tomorrow night will be immediately followed by a second night without a day inbetween.
